channel.title: 1992 on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in 1992 on Sermon Archives

item.title: The Man Who Didn't Care
item.description: This is a printed and highlighted sermon from 1992 from Pentecost. It is highlighted with yellow higlighter. This is the 150th sermon that I have uploaded to this site.

item.title: From Repentance to Hope
item.description: This Lenten sermon is from 1992 and appears to be printed out from a computer, then highlighted in yellow and marked with black ink. The text mentions that it is World Hunger Sunday. The sermon was preached in Seymour, WI.

item.title: Facing Temptation
item.description: This is a lenten sermon from March of 1992. It is scanned and highlighted, and the margins have references to “L” and “G”, but I don’t know what they mean.

item.title: Fulfilling the Scripture
item.description: Scanned, this sermon is typed and highlighted. It mentions President “Busch”, although I don’t believe that it’s a beer reference.
